home.sub_title_header: Infographics, videos, books, consults with healers and workshops
home.about_platform_description_line1: We are a healing platform that considers different healing approaches providing alternatives for people to freelly choose what makes sense for each one.
home.about_platform_description_line2: We have incorporated ancestral approaches, such as Mapuche (Chile), Quero (Andes) and also acupuncture (Chinese ancestral medicine), reading Akashic Records and astrological chart. In addition, we beleive in a collaborative and amorous approach, we have also incorporated Western conventional medicine.
home.to_whom_directed_line_1: To those people who do not find the answers to their ailments in conventional medicine.
home.to_whom_directed_line_2: To those who feel with certainty that diseases are related to the emotions and the spirit.
home.to_whom_directed_line_3: To those of us who believe that we are body, mind and spirit and do not want to be treated as Clients anymore.
home.approach_1_description: Integrative medicines considers body, mind, and spirit from differentperspective. It also can incorporate energies coming from the universe(planets and Superior Energies).
home.approach_2_description: Ancestral medicines are those performed by Native People from different parts of the world and considers spirit, emotions, and body. Highly influenced by herbs treatments.
home.approach_3_description: Traditional Chinese medicine seeks balance in the body and harmony between the natural forces of yin and yang, which could be blocking the person's qi (energy) and causing illness.
home.approach_4_description: A system by which doctors and other health care professionals (for example, nurses, pharmacists, and therapists) treat symptoms and illnesses using drugs, radiation, or surgery.
home.what_Will_find_description: From the easiest to the more complex to guide you in your healing process.
home.who_we_are_description: We are a group of healers, from different cultures, from different American Native tribes contributing to the healing of our souls and body. I had a dream back in 2016 where I visualized the name of our start up Matchetune, which is a word game in English and Mapuzungun (mapuches language): In English you read: Match, between us, others and mother nature + “e” of technology + Tune, to make fine tunning with ancestral healing and worldview. In Spanish you read: machitun, which is a healing ritual performed inside a Ruka (tend) where the Machi (mapuche healer) connect with spirits and heal. Join our matchetune!

testimonials.t1: Finding this page was a gift. I am in search of my spirituality. I was able to understand what it means when talking about alternative medicines and find a lot of valuable information.
testimonials.t2: Thank you for showing me that there is much more content, beyond allopathic medicine! I was fascinated to see that the Native Peoples have their own health systems. We are in an era of understanding, and I liked that various approaches were shared and to be able to learn from all the visions.
testimonials.t3: After reading a lot of the information they offer, watching some videos and opening my mind, I was able to understand a lot about my health. Then I chose to talk and consult with a professional from one of the healing currents. I felt that the platform led me towards my healing and today I feel that I have come a long way. All very loving and intuitive. Thank you!
testimonials.t4: I am living a moment of many important changes, at times with a lot of confusion.For this reason, I appointed with Javier, for a chakra alignment.The experience was far beyond my expectations I arrived at a welcoming, harmonious and solemn space. And a very healing conversation took place... key questions, precise words... then, an experience of chakra alignment with visualizations of opening and light, of energetic and physical unlocking of my chakras.

questions.q1: Can I follow an alternative treatment if I am in treatment with a doctor?
questions.answer1: Our approach is inclusive, respectful, and amorous. We think that each healing approach is valid as long as it contributes to the healing of the person, we do not rule out any approach as long as it has heal a person. In this sense, of course it is possible to be following an allopathic treatment for pain, for example, and appoint an acupuncture session. We always suggest informing your doctor of the alternative treatments you are undergoing.
questions.q2: Are the consultations online or face-to-face?
questions.answer2: You can schedule a session with our therapists and professionals, either online or in person, at one of our healing centers.
questions.q3: Can I see more than one specialist?
questions.answer3: Of course! This is the magic of our platform: showing diverse approaches that make sense to YOU, that you feel contribute to your healing. It is very interesting the different views of an ailment that the different healing currents can have, and if it makes sense for you to explore one or the other, you just have to do it and nurture yourself from each experience. Go ahead!
